operation.name: ContextSubscription
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text>NGSI10 Standard <br />POST /ngsi10/subscribeContext<br />Subscribe to a context/entity operation:<br />• This operation allows the asynchronous retrieval of Context Information. It is used for subscription to Context Information.<br />The subscription triggers the notifications about the matching ContextEntities based on the defined NotifyCondition<br />information passed in the subscribeContextRequest operation. In the subscribeContextResponse operation a subscription id<br />is returned, which is used for notifications and in update and unsubscribe operations. The subscription duration is negotiated<br />during the subscription request/response operation.</text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: CreateNewEntity
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard </b> POST /v1/updateContext <b> </b>update operation: • append: it adds the new attribute. Note: this may result in multiple attributes with the same name; </text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: DeleteEntityByID
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <prerequisites class="list"> <prerequisite> <key></key> <value></value> </prerequisite> <prerequisite reference="../prerequisite"/> </prerequisites> <text><b>NGSI10 convenience /v2</b> DELETE /v2/entities/<entityId> Delete an entity by its ID   </text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: DiscoverContextAvailability
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard </b> POST /v1/queryContext  This operation allows for the synchronous retrieval of Context Information</text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: GetAllEntities
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard </b> POST /v1/updateContext <b> </b>update operation: • append: it adds the new attribute. Note: this may result in multiple attributes with the same name; </text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: QueryEntity
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard </b> POST /v1/queryContext  This operation allows for the synchronous retrieval of Context Information</text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: RegisterContext
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard </b> POST /v1/updateContext <b> </b>update operation: • append: it adds the new attribute. Note: this may result in multiple attributes with the same name; </text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: UnsubscribeContextSubscription
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text>NGSI10 Standard <br />POST /ngsi10/unsubscribeContext<br />Unsubscribe to a context/entity operation<br /></text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: UpdateEntity
operation.description: <multiple> <keywords class="list"/> <descriptions class="list"> <simple> <keywords class="list"> <string>Description</string> </keywords> <text><b>NGSI10 Standard</b>  POST /v1/updateContext  update operation: • update: it replaces the value and metadata of the existing attributes with the same name;</text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple> </descriptions> </multiple>

operation.name: checkReturnMessage
operation.description: <simple> <keywords class="list"/> <text>@synthesis@<br/>Check that the error code is $result$<br/>@/synthesis@<br/><br/>Check if an error code $result$ is returned </text> <isPlainText>false</isPlainText> </simple>

story.name: SUT::checkReturnMessage()
story.description: result = self.return_message

story.name: SUT::RegisterContext()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: RegisterContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REGISTER_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::QueryEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: QueryContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: QueryContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadSuccess ---@uncertaintyapp: sleeping_sensor ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor ---@uncertaintyplt: missing_sensor self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DiscoverContextAvailability()
story.description: ---@REQ: DiscoverContextAvailability if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE)) and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON))) ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadSuccess self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::CODE_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::GetAllEntities()
story.description: ---@REQ: GetAllEntities let linkedEntities: Set(OrionContextBroker_GEi::Classes::Entity) = Entity.allInstances()->select(e: Entity | e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- IN_PAYLOAD <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/JSON_PAYLOAD_ERROR self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (linkedEntities->size() = self.entities->size()) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/SUCESS self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DiscoverContextAvailability()
story.description: ---@REQ: DiscoverContextAvailability if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE)) and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadSuccess self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::CODE_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::CreateNewEntity()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: EntityCreation if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) ---@AIM: EntityCreation/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::GetAllEntities()
story.description: ---@REQ: GetAllEntities let linkedEntities: Set(OrionContextBroker_GEi::Classes::Entity) = Entity.allInstances()->select(e: Entity | e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_PAYLOAD <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/JSON_PAYLOAD_ERROR self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (linkedEntities->size() = self.entities->size()) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/SUCESS self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::ContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: ContextSubscription let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: negative_throttle, reference_notReacheable ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor self.subscriber->includes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UnsubscribeContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: UnsubscribeContextSubscription if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (self.subscriber->excludes(subs)) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/does_not_exists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: code_ko self.subscriber->excludes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::RegisterContext()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: RegisterContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REGISTER_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UpdateEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: EntityUpdate if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadSuccess entity.isUpdated = true and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::ContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: ContextSubscription let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON)) ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: negative_throttle, reference_notReacheable ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor self.subscriber->includes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DiscoverContextAvailability()
story.description: ---@REQ: DiscoverContextAvailability if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE)) and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and entity.sut.oclIsUndefined())) ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadSuccess self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::CODE_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::QueryEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: QueryContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and entity.sut.oclIsUndefined())) ---@AIM: QueryContext/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadSuccess ---@uncertaintyapp: sleeping_sensor ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor ---@uncertaintyplt: missing_sensor self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UnsubscribeContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: UnsubscribeContextSubscription if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (self.subscriber->excludes(subs)) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/does_not_exists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: code_ko self.subscriber->excludes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::QueryEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: QueryContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON))) ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadSuccess ---@uncertaintyapp: sleeping_sensor ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor ---@uncertaintyplt: missing_sensor self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::ContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: ContextSubscription let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else let entiti: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not e.sut.oclIsUndefined() ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: ContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: negative_throttle, reference_notReacheable ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor self.subscriber->includes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UnsubscribeContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: UnsubscribeContextSubscription if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (self.subscriber->excludes(subs)) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and self.subscriber->excludes(subs)) ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/does_not_exists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: code_ko self.subscriber->excludes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UpdateEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: EntityUpdate if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON))) ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadSuccess entity.isUpdated = true and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UpdateEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: EntityUpdate if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE)) ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadSuccess entity.isUpdated = true and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DeleteEntityByID()
story.description: ---@REQ: DeleteEntityByID if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/EntityDoesNotExist self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/Success self.entities->excludes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DELETE_OK endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UnsubscribeContextSubscription()
story.description: ---@REQ: UnsubscribeContextSubscription if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/Invalid url self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let subs: Subscribtion = Subscribtion.allInstances()->any(s: Subscribtion | IN_ENTITYID = s.ID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (self.subscriber->excludes(subs)) then ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/does_not_exists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not self.subscriber->excludes(subs) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON)) ---@AIM: UnsubscribeContextSubscription/success ---@uncertaintyapp: code_ko self.subscriber->excludes(subs) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::SUBSCRIBTION_ID else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DiscoverContextAvailability()
story.description: ---@REQ: DiscoverContextAvailability if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE)) and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: DiscoverContextAvailability/JSONPayloadSuccess self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::CODE_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::CreateNewEntity()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: EntityCreation if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON)) ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UpdateEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: EntityUpdate if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadSuccess entity.isUpdated = true and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::CreateNewEntity()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: EntityCreation if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DeleteEntityByID()
story.description: ---@REQ: DeleteEntityByID if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/EntityDoesNotExist self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else -- not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and not entity.sut.oclIsUndefined() ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/Success self.entities->excludes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DELETE_OK endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::UpdateEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: EntityUpdate if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityUpdate/JSONPayloadSuccess entity.isUpdated = true and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::RegisterContext()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: RegisterContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: RegisterContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: RegisterContext/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REGISTER_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::DeleteEntityByID()
story.description: ---@REQ: DeleteEntityByID if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/EntityDoesNotExist self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else ---@AIM: DeleteEntityByID/Success self.entities->excludes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DELETE_OK endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::GetAllEntities()
story.description: ---@REQ: GetAllEntities let linkedEntities: Set(OrionContextBroker_GEi::Classes::Entity) = Entity.allInstances()->select(e: Entity | e.payloadType = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON ) in if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/JSON_PAYLOAD_ERROR self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (linkedEntities->size() = self.entities->size()) then -- IN_PAYLOAD <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and (not (IN_PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) and linkedEntities->size() = self.entities->size())) ---@AIM: GetAllEntities/SUCESS self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::QueryEntity()
story.description: ---@REQ: QueryContext if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | e.Id = IN_ENTITYID and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE ) in if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then -- IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE <> PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE and (not (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) and IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (entity.sut.oclIsUndefined()) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/ContextDoesNotExists self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::DOESNT_EXIST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: QueryContext/JSONPayloadSuccess ---@uncertaintyapp: sleeping_sensor ---@uncertaintyint: notregistered_sensor ---@uncertaintyplt: missing_sensor self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()

story.name: SUT::CreateNewEntity()
story.description: let entity: Entity = Entity.allInstances()->any(e: Entity | (e.sut.oclIsUndefined() and e.payloadType = IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE) and e.Id = IN_ENTITYID ) in ---@REQ: EntityCreation if (IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL) then -- IN_URL = URL::INVALIDURL ---@AIM: EntityCreation/UrlError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::URL_ERROR else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON_ERROR) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::BAD_REQUEST else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::EMPTY_CONTEXT_VALUE) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/EmptyContextValueError self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::EMPTY_VALUE_NOT_ALLOWED else if (IN_PAYLOAD_TYPE = PAYLOAD_TYPE::JSON) then ---@AIM: EntityCreation/JSONPayloadSuccess self.entities->includes(entity) and self.return_message = RETURN_MESSAGE::REQUEST_OK else false endif endif endif endif and result = self.return_message and self.checkReturnMessage()
